meanings.definition: To make a loud, harsh noise.
meanings.sent1: The thunder kecks outside the window.
meanings.sent2: The old door kecks loudly when you open it.
meanings.sent3: The engine of the car started to kecks unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The wind kecks through the trees on a stormy night.
